DESCRIPTION: This card or effect behaves slightly differently than it's supposed to.
Damage and block modifiers will not display correctly on this card.
This card does something more interesting when you are playing with #bfriends.
Vulnerable creatures take #b100% more damage from the next Attack.
Weakened creatures deal #b1 less damage with the next Attack.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
